channel.title: Alerts-X on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Alerts-X on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Overview
item.description: In order to analyze useful metrics about performance, Alerts-X extracts, loads and stores data from all TravelgateX products. Once the metrics are stored in our infrastructure, our service-alerts analyze your performance according to a configuration alert which can be create/update or view using API alertsWorking with Alerts-X The most important use case working with Alerts is to query about your performance.
